Description: Bike machine rooms located at convenient places allow users to use it and pay per use. All machine will be connected and upload users' data to the cloud server so that users are able to be access to their own data easily.

A series of exercise machines including both cardio and weight training machines are connected together. The system will create the workout plan based on users' goal It allows users to use different machines to optimize the workout and collects data from all machines; and finally it will provide a conprehensive analysis to the users.
A user might forget what he was going to do after the workout because he's tired. User can set a reminder before the workout and the machine will remind the user after the workout
The machine can connect to Amazon echo; Siri or any similar product and allow the users to use their voice to control the machine.
The machine provide a list of entertainment like music; movie; TV show and game. It can also allow users to install app like Netflix; Hulu to get access to their own subscription.
Let's user catch up on their favorite TV show while working out and picks a workout with the right length
Works with a user's smartphone and home system to notify about important happenings
Allow the user to answer the door or phone during the workout on the bike without interuptting the workout.
Using the user's phone to identify user through wireless or bluetooth.
Unique users are identified by connecting with the user's smartphone
Shows the user their status mid-workout
Shows the user how their performance has changed over time based on their workout history
At the end of the workout; show the calories equivalent of the current workout in terms of food. e.g. a pint of icecream.
BIke machine combined with panoramic optical display to give users a immersive experience in exercising while playing.
Shows user the past workout stats for a friend and encourages them to try to beat their friend
Allows the user to play an interactive game which requires them to exercise
An encourgement from the inbuilt personal trainer; Eve; once a user reaches a mini milestone or completes a workout.
Provide users their personalized plan everytime when they start to exercise.
Include music of the similiar speed in the optimal workout. Change music from user's folder in different stages of the workout
Based on the user's pace; music is automatically selected and played to match that speed
Different users have different goals in mind. Through a set of selections; users can pick the one that matches his or her goal.
Allows user to choose a personalized workout based off of goals
Detect users' real-time physical condition accurately using a handle sensor.
Allow customers to install the feature they want. And it will be easy to repair the machines by simply replace the broken part hot swappingly.
Almost everyone has a smart phone nowadays; it would be nice if there is a dock that can transfer user music/videos and charge it at the same time during workout.
Unique users are identified by their unique fingerprint
Whenever the users start to use the machine; the physical and digital setting will be adjusted automatically.
Have easy to adjust handles; seats; and display screen so users of different sizes can enjoy the machine to the full potential.
The machine finds out directly how heavy is ther user so he or she doesn't have to do it while keying in the personal information
Change the handles of the bike to race bike handles to make the user feel powerful
Have a water dispence built into the machine so the user doesn't need to go far away for water
Tilt the whole machine for different experiences
Have small workout for different parts of the machine. For example; the bike brakes on the handle could be used as a grip trainer or the bike can be coupled with another trainning machine.
Have an energy bar dispenser
Have a desinated place to hold towels
Allows the bike to lean foward and back and tilt left and right.
Surround sound speaker to imitate biking noise in the real world
Have the exercise machine go around the gym on a set race track depending on speed of the user. (Race with other users)

Concept Title: bring your bike to workout day
Description: Instead of a exercise machine; attach a real bike to the exercise machine and bike on a real bike. (a bike treadmill)
Lets user keep their arms moving for maximum cardio output during a workout
Paired with machine; reads user's heart rate more accurately
Mimics real life noise rather than music
Measures and records the maximum strength of the user's various muscle groups; for example; grip strength
The whole bike moves to mimic cycling over uneven surfaces in real life
Would use either wfi or the user's phone connection to allow them the same connectivity as a smartphone to browse the web; read the news; email; etc.
Lets user put their water bottle within reach
Can play cycling class videos on demand to mimic actually participating in a class
Users can ride the bike like playing a arcade machine and compete with each other
Users can manually turn on the punishment and force themselve to keep cycling when they are tired and want to quit.
Users get simple rewards for sticking to the optimal workout plan.
Communicate and share the data with a personal trainer through the system to get more advices on their workout.
Users that are using different machines in the gym can have video chat when exercising.
Allow the user to perform a wheelie.
Attach a generator to the bike machine and generate electircity when the user is cycling; and the user can get paid for it.

The bike machine works like bikes in real life. And in this mode; the machine will simulate a real life cycling experience including cornering and straight line racing and let the users set their own records and challenge others'.
The bike machine simulate real condition when mountain biking.
Using VR or AR technique to simulate a biking tour; and put friends in the same virtual world; allowing them to ride together and chat.
